note.p: Death: Ventnor, Isle of Wight (16 July 1883)
Career: Professor of Hindoostance, Teloogoo, and Oriental Languages, Hayleybury College; Librarian, Hayleybury.
Notes: 'J Lincoln' is John Kaye, Bishop of Lincoln
References: R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 1. 1731-1847' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 307-332
R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
